2: The base has been weirdly quiet lately.

3: Maybe it's because Kamui hasn't shown up recently.
Strike Hawks are in charge of scouting the battlefields. They rarely have the chance for a long period of rest.

2: I'm just used to having him around.
4: It just feels a little empty here.

3: Let me check the parts in our storage. Maybe Kamui will come back for his maintenance in the future.

2: I'll go update the connection data as well.

3: I'll also help with preparation.
Don't get used to that.

2: Do you miss him too, Lee?

3: ...Of course not. I just find it so much quieter now.
I'll go check the device status and make sure it's running normally.
I'm just doing this so that when the fool arrives, we can lock him inside the chamber immediately and shut him up.
BANG—
It is a loud thump of something heavy hitting the wall.
Chrome?
My apologies. I did tell him to stop moving.
Kamui?!
I said I can walk! Stop holding me, Capt!

4: How did he get that hurt?

3: He was acting impulsive and rushed into a swarm of Corrupted by himself.
Thanks to him, we did manage to save a few people who almost got devoured by the Corrupted. They're getting treated right now.
Lee, get his other arm.
Got it.
I-I'll go calibrate the Maintenance Chamber.
I just checked. We have enough parts in our storage.
I'm fine! Everyone's just being a drama queen.
Go rest up, Commandant! Don't worry about me.
I'm a Construct! As long as the Inver-Device isn't damaged, I'll be alright.

2: That doesn't mean you don't have to take care of yourself!

3: ...Right. Sorry.

4: I don't need your apology. I need you in one piece.

3: Okay.
Thanks, Commandant.
The almighty Kamui will be back by your side in no time!
